title: World’s Worst Bond Market Faces Another Big Supply Shock
description: Japan’s government bond market is set for another tough year as investors contend with the largest net increase in supply in well over a decade.
content: Japan’s government bond market is set for another tough year as investors contend with the largest net increase in supply in well over a decade.
